entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
